title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Combat Aircraft Target Missile Launchers and Hezbollah Military Infrastructures in South Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked the launcher from which missiles were fired towards Kiryat Shmona; additional military infrastructures were attacked in South Lebanon.

Earlier today (Wednesday), combat aircraft attacked the launcher from which missiles were fired towards Kiryat Shmona this morning.

In addition, several military infrastructures of the Hezbollah terrorist organization were attacked in the Al-Ski area, between Bint Jbeil and Yaroun.

Following the alarms in the Western Galilee area, several launches from Lebanon towards Israeli territory were identified, some of which fell in Lebanese territory and the rest in open areas in Israel, with no casualties.

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/49QHYYp
